modName: Art Of War Re-Texture for the Long Bow
summary: This mod simply replace\'s the default texture of the Long Bow with one that looks similar to the art of war camo from Black Ops 2
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply replace\'s the default texture of the Long Bow with one that looks similar to the art of war camo from Black Ops 2

This is my first mod so its nothing amazing but i plan to update it so it looks better and its still a nice replacement as it is check pics if your interested.

I\'m open to any re-texturing requests just let me no what you want and ill try me best.

Note that this mod only changes the way the Long Bow looks .All stats are the same as the default long bow. And the bow can be had in all the same ways as a normal one.


Installation

Just drag and drop the RAR contents into your Skyrim Data Folder. copy and replace if needed.

By Default - \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data\"

Uninstall

Delete the folder \"wooden\" in your skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons folder
or
if you don\'t have any weapon mods installed you can just delete the weapons folder in skyrim\\data\\textures.
author: Browndd
